title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9770.2 - Prompt payment policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9770.2 - Prompt payment policy

State Regulations

It shall be the policy of the New York Local Government

Assistance Corporation to process contract payments efficiently and
expeditiously so as to assure payment in a timely manner to firms and
organizations which do business with the corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9770.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
